title: To all garen mains
body: You better keep it down with the calls for buffs,  the minute he gets picked more in LCS he's probably gonna get "Veigar'd" given how oppressive his silence can be sometimes( especially if it kills a Zed in competetive play, we don't want garen to affect "BIG PLAYS" now do we?)

pff that guy didnt even build cleaver the most efficient dps item on garen period.
im seriously wondering how a "pro" player forgets that you need this late game on garen.

He picked Garen into an awful match up, played him bad, and built him bad.

I honestly think he was trolling lol
Took the words right out of my mouth.
Who?
^this
It didn't happen to Viktor, it won't happen to Garen.

Because Viktor is actually a pretty healthy champion, and the tank meta rolled in right as he was getting popular (and tank meta means Viktor can't really burst anyone 100-0 like he wants too).

Garen is ok in terms of game health, but if he is strong, he can be REALLY strong, which is not good. Riot has been doing a lot of stuff right with him though (like the passive buff that didn't make him into an unkillable lane bully like he used to be), so I'll hold my opinion on him for now, and wait to see if he starts to show up more.
Am I the only one who thinks Garen is in a good place as of now?
Apart from his ult needing a reasonable buff, he is fine.

Well he did do horribly when picked for once in pro play...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qI-sHdPjuMA

But to be fair, the Garen played full tank, and was ignored. Sunfire cape doesn't cut it.
And to be fair, that bot lane got wrecked.

That Garen:

* built armor builds against a double AP laners
* never builds Black Cleaver or even a brutalizer

So I must say that Garen has been misplayed a lot in that match.
He was too poor and their Kog was fed as balls. There's no point to black cleaver if he'd just be dead by the time he touched anything.

There's no point to Garen existing if all he is doing is not being dead. Garen has to deal damage or else he is irrelevant. If he died faster, that's fine, he would have at least softened up their team for his Lucian, gotten Kog low, and likely gotten Xerath low if he could get to him. Without BC or an IE, Garen does literally nothing. His split pushing is average, his team fighting is pathetic, his peel is pathetic, and his damage is unnoticeable.

He rushed sunfire into a Maokai.

W.
T.
F.

He could have rushed Brutalizer and bullied the crap out of Maokai who is well known for his weak lane phase, then gotten a specter's cowl or Aegis to deal with the AP damage coming from Maokai, Xerath, and Kog. At that, point, he could have gone for the sunfire if it was a must, but really at that point he should have built something like Thornmail and Randuins, finished Locket or Spirit Visage, and then gotten a BC or started an IE.

Garen needs damage to be relevant in any way, since his CC sucks and he has no peel for his team. If he doesn't deal damage, the enemy team walks by him and spams laugh while he tries to slap them around.
That has got to be the worst "pro" match I've ever seen.
Those shoutcasters are assholes.

To all Garen mains: I respect your ability to play someone perceived as weak, through thick and thin. Seriously, I love mains of the lesser-played champions. 

Nothing in the world will stop me from picking my favorite champions, not even their power levels if/when they're considered crap. Diana and Ashe <3

I main Miss Fortune.

Lesser-played champions aren't always terrible, typically I get extremely fed (along the lines of 11-2 but my best game with her so far has been 20-0) and carry the game. I think Garen is a similar case, he's a really oudated champion and even his model is poor in comparison to most newer champions though both Garen and Miss Fortune are underplayed and don't have the most updated kit or model they're both extremely strong and aren't by any means ez mode freelo Katarina slam face on keyboard to pentakill, being balanced and as a reliable pick once you mastered.

And I have to agree, if Riot nerfs Miss Fortune for example I don't think I'll ever stop playing her just because she's my favorite champion in the game. This happened with Sona who I think I have over 120 games with.
